Name: Eco-hotel
Abstract: This dataset includes Online Textual Reviews from both online (e.g., TripAdvisor) and offline (e.g., Guests' book) sources from the Areias do Seixo Eco-Resort.
RelevantInfo:
The CSV holds one cell per review, except the first row, which is the header.
All the 401 reviews were collected between January and August of 2015.
Source:
C.Calheiros, S.Moro, P.Rita (ISCTE-IUL).
Acknowledgement: This dataset was provided thanks to GonÃ§alo Alves, the Areias do Seixo Manager (http://www.areiasdoseixo.com/hotel-overview.html).
Acknowledgements:
